name: Bospop

config_properties.name: Bospop
config_properties.description: A classic rock and pop festival in Weert, Netherlands, held annually since 1981.

ai_profile:
**Bospop 2026 Festival Profile**

Bospop 2026 brings together an eclectic lineup of 39 artists spanning a variety of genres, with a strong emphasis on rock and its subgenres. Rock dominates the festival with 15 acts, complemented by Blues Rock, Alternative Rock, and Indie Rock, showcasing a rich diversity of sounds. Notable additions include genres like Symphonic Metal, Soul, and Funk, alongside niche offerings such as Celtic Punk, Stoner Rock, and Experimental music. This year’s lineup provides something for everyone, from hard-hitting riffs to soulful melodies and electrifying experimental beats.

The festival continues to spotlight international talent, featuring artists from 10 countries. The USA leads the pack with 10 acts, followed by the Netherlands and the UK, each contributing six artists. Canada, Belgium, and Australia also make strong showings, adding to the global appeal of the festival. However, diversity in representation remains an area for growth, as only four artists are confirmed as people of color, with seven artists’ backgrounds unknown. Similarly, gender diversity is limited, with 27 male artists compared to just five female performers.

Audience feedback has been overwhelmingly positive, with an impressive average rating of 8.16 out of 10 based on responses from 82.1% of the lineup. A majority of rated acts scored between 8 and 10, highlighting the high-quality performances expected at Bospop 2026. With its commitment to genre variety and a blend of veteran and emerging talent, the festival promises to deliver another memorable experience for fans of all musical tastes.
